doc: Update obsolete links to online reference #19582

Updated all the obsolete links to valid ones.

Found this issue from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/19582.

events.body: Thanks. Will take a look. I'll see if I can figure out how to do that. :)
There'd also be the https://btcinformation.org/en/developer-reference#reject website , not sure which one to prefer, though. Another alternative would be to remove the links completely.

> There'd also be the https://btcinformation.org/en/developer-reference#reject website , not sure which one to prefer, though. Another alternative would be to remove the links completely.

+1 to remove them.

This script could be used:
```
-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i '/https:\/\/bitcoin.org\/en\/developer-reference/d' ./src/protocol.h
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
```
